parameters.name: full_name
parameters.description: (string) The three-level (fully qualified) name of the model version

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: (integer) The integer version number of the model version

parameters.name: include_browse
parameters.description: Whether to include model versions in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

parameters.name: include_aliases
parameters.description: Whether to include aliases associated with the model version in the response

200.description: Successfully retrieved the properties of the model version

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
